    <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>false</active>
        <description>Show how to trigger an action based on an event (e.g. update these records based on this thing.
eventQueueScheduled and eventQueue - from the community: https://community.servicenow.com/community?id=community_question&sys_id=cb128de8dbb1bb80d58ea345ca961980</description>
        <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live - Stream 2019-07-02">b4598053db563700a8a216370596196b</episode>
        <name>Script actions</name>
        <script><![CDATA[gr = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
gr.newRecord();
gr.name = "CR is Completed-" + current.end_date;
gr.run_type = "once";
gr.run_start = current.end_date;
gr.script = "var changeReq = new GlideRecord('change_request');\n";
gr.script += "changeReq.addQuery('number','" + current.number + "');\n";
gr.script += "changeReq.query();\n";
gr.script += "if (changeReq.next()) {\n";
gr.script += "  changeReq.u_mark_cr_complete = true;\n";
gr.script += "  changeReq.update();\n";
gr.script += "}\n";]]></script>
